verses.verse: And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H2330>put<s%> <S%H2330>forth<s%> a <S%H2420>riddle,<s%> and <S%H4911>speak<s%> a <S%H4912>parable<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>

And <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> A <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5404>eagle<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3671>wings,<s%> long <S%H750>winged,<s%> <S%H83><s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H5133>feathers,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> had <S%H7553>divers<s%> <S%H7553>colors,<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H6788>highest<s%> <S%H6788>branch<s%> of the <S%H730>cedar:<s%>

He <S%H6998>cropped<s%> off the <S%H7218>top<s%> of his <S%H3242>young<s%> <S%H3242>twigs,<s%> and <S%H935>carried<s%> it into a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>traffic;<s%> he <S%H7760>set<s%> it in a <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H7402>merchants.<s%>

He <S%H3947>took<s%> also of the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> and planted it in a <S%H2233>fruitful<s%> <S%H7704>field;<s%> he <S%H3947>placed<s%> it by <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters,<s%> and <S%H7760>set<s%> it as a <S%H6851>willow<s%> tree.

And it <S%H6779>grew,<s%> and <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H5628>spreading<s%> <S%H1612>vine<s%> of <S%H8217>low<s%> <S%H6967>stature,<s%> whose <S%H1808>branches<s%> <S%H6437>turned<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> him, and the <S%H8328>roots<s%> thereof were <S%H8478>under<s%> him: so it <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H1612>vine,<s%> and <S%H5375>brought<s%> <S%H6213>forth<s%> <S%H905>branches,<s%> and <S%H7971>shot<s%> forth <S%H6288>sprigs.<s%>

There was also <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5404>eagle<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3671>wings<s%> and <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5133>feathers:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H1612>vine<s%> did <S%H3719>bend<s%> her <S%H8328>roots<s%> <S%H5921>toward<s%> him, and <S%H7971>shot<s%> forth her <S%H1808>branches<s%> <S%H5921>toward<s%> him, that he might <S%H8248>water<s%> it by the <S%H6170>furrows<s%> of her <S%H4302>plantation.<s%>

It was <S%H8362>planted<s%> in a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H7704>soil<s%> by <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters,<s%> that it might <S%H6213>bring<s%> <S%H6213>forth<s%> <S%H6057>branches,<s%> and that it might <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H6529>fruit,<s%> that it might be a <S%H155>goodly<s%> <S%H1612>vine.<s%>

<S%H559>Say<s%> you, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> Shall it <S%H6743>prosper?<s%> shall he not <S%H5423>pull<s%> up the <S%H8328>roots<s%> thereof, and <S%H7082>cut<s%> off the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> thereof, that it <S%H3001>wither?<s%> it shall <S%H3001>wither<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2964>leaves<s%> of her <S%H6780>spring,<s%> even <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2220>power<s%> or <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H5375>pluck<s%> it up by the <S%H8328>roots<s%> thereof.

Yes, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> being <S%H8362>planted,<s%> shall it <S%H6743>prosper?<s%> shall it not utterly <S%H3001>wither,<s%> when the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> it? it shall <S%H3001>wither<s%> in the <S%H6170>furrows<s%> <S%H5921>where<s%> it <S%H6780>grew.<s%>
Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H559>Say<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> to the <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H3045>Know<s%> you not <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things mean? <S%H559>tell<s%> them, <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and has <S%H3947>taken<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> thereof, and the <S%H8269>princes<s%> thereof, and <S%H935>led<s%> them with him to <S%H894>Babylon;<s%>

And has <S%H3947>taken<s%> of the <S%H4410>king's<s%> <S%H2233>seed,<s%> and <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with him, and has <S%H935>taken<s%> an <S%H423>oath<s%> of him: he has also <S%H3947>taken<s%> the <S%H352>mighty<s%> of the <S%H776>land:<s%>
That the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> might be <S%H8217>base,<s%> that it might not <S%H5375>lift<s%> itself up, but that by <S%H8104>keeping<s%> of his <S%H1285>covenant<s%> it might <S%H5975>stand.<s%>

But he <S%H4775>rebelled<s%> against him in <S%H7971>sending<s%> his <S%H4397>ambassadors<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> that they might <S%H5414>give<s%> him <S%H5483>horses<s%> and <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%> Shall he <S%H6743>prosper?<s%> shall he <S%H4422>escape<s%> that <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H428>such<s%> things? or shall he <S%H6565>break<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> and be <S%H4422>delivered?<s%>

As I <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> <S%H518>surely<s%> <S%H3808><s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> where the <S%H4428>king<s%> dwells that made him <S%H4427>king,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H423>oath<s%> he <S%H959>despised,<s%> and <S%H853>whose<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> he <S%H6565>broke,<s%> even with him in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> he shall <S%H4191>die.<s%>

<S%H3808>Neither<s%> shall <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> with his <S%H1419>mighty<s%> <S%H2428>army<s%> and <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6951>company<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> for him in the <S%H4421>war,<s%> by <S%H8210>casting<s%> up <S%H5550>mounts,<s%> and <S%H1129>building<s%> <S%H1785>forts,<s%> to <S%H3772>cut<s%> off <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5315>persons:<s%>

Seeing he <S%H959>despised<s%> the <S%H423>oath<s%> by <S%H6565>breaking<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> when, <S%H2009>see,<s%> he had <S%H5414>given<s%> his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and has <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things, he shall not <S%H4422>escape.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> As I <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H518>surely<s%> <S%H3808><s%> my <S%H423>oath<s%> that he has <S%H959>despised,<s%> and my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> that he has <S%H6331>broken,<s%> even it will I <S%H5414>recompense<s%> on his own <S%H7218>head.<s%>

And I will <S%H6566>spread<s%> my <S%H7568>net<s%> on him, and he shall be <S%H8610>taken<s%> in my <S%H4686>snare,<s%> and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> him to <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and will <S%H8199>plead<s%> with him <S%H8033>there<s%> for his <S%H4604>trespass<s%> that he has <S%H4604>trespassed<s%> against me.

And <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4015>fugitives<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H102>bands<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and they that <S%H7604>remain<s%> shall be <S%H6566>scattered<s%> toward <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H7307>winds:<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it.

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> I will also <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H6788>highest<s%> <S%H6788>branch<s%> of the <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H730>cedar,<s%> and will <S%H5414>set<s%> it; I will <S%H6998>crop<s%> off from the <S%H7218>top<s%> of his <S%H3127>young<s%> <S%H3127>twigs<s%> a <S%H7390>tender<s%> one, and will <S%H8362>plant<s%> it on an <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%> and <S%H8524>eminent:<s%>

In the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of the <S%H4791>height<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will I <S%H8362>plant<s%> it: and it shall <S%H5375>bring<s%> <S%H5375>forth<s%> <S%H6057>boughs,<s%> and <S%H6213>bear<s%> <S%H6529>fruit,<s%> and be a <S%H117>goodly<s%> <S%H730>cedar:<s%> and <S%H8478>under<s%> it shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6833>fowl<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3671>wing;<s%> in the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of the <S%H1808>branches<s%> thereof shall they <S%H7931>dwell.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H8213>brought<s%> <S%H8213>down<s%> the <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H6086>tree,<s%> have <S%H1361>exalted<s%> the <S%H8217>low<s%> <S%H6086>tree,<s%> have <S%H3001>dried<s%> up the <S%H3892>green<s%> <S%H6086>tree,<s%> and have made the <S%H3002>dry<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%> to <S%H6524>flourish:<s%> I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> and have <S%H6213>done<s%> it.
